thread.section_title: Bedandbreakfast.eu Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Bedandbreakfast.eu | www.bedandbreakfast.eu | 3 van 369
thread.title: Andrew Jones

author: Andrew Jones
title: Andrew Jones
text:
The website is very useful for finding B&Bs. I am planning our first trip to Europe and have used your website exclusively.
The only issue I had was when trying to make a booking and it connected me with booking.com to make the reservation. I was unable to make the reservation because booking.com would not accept my credit card. I found a different suitable B&B that did not use booking.com for reservation.
One Item found very useful on your site is the map of the listed B&Bs. I suggest that you make the map larger and searchable from the main page.
I will recommend your site and use it in the future.
